prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek yellow body and unique mind powers.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a humanoid with psychic abilities and a mischievous grin.
Generate a unique design for a bipedal Pokemon that has a yellow and gray color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a psychic and has a mystical aura.
Imagine a Pokemon characterized by its psychic powers and agile movements in battle.
Design a Pokemon that has a striking appearance with a blend of yellow and red accents.
Give me a concept for a Pokemon that represents intelligence and cunning in its design.
